## Welcome

This site presents analysis and materials about learning English for IT professionals.

### Highlights

- Explore whether respondents have ever paused learning English: [Obstacles](notebooks/obstacles.qmd)
- View how effective and engaging respondents found different learning methods: [Learning Methods](notebooks/methods.qmd)
- Analyse motivation types and correlations between learning attitudes: [Correlations](notebooks/correlations.qmd)

### How to reproduce

You can rebuild the data and pages locally:

```bash
uv run --python 3.12 python -m src.scripts.preprocess
QUARTO_PYTHON=.venv/bin/python quarto render
```
